post.body: I do like the phrase "mail me your undies" though. Maybe we can start a blog? Would anyone participate? #mailmeyourundies
Ack. Gross! I don't want to wear used women's undies unless I'm sleeping with the person who wore them.
Tabbing over and hitting cmd - n isn't bad, but, because of variability of applications open, it requires too much thinking.
See. That's the hitch. I want a key or a shortcut that will just put me in the finder with an open window from anywhere.
You've provoked me to think I should get women's underwear, just so I can say, "I'm wearing women's underwear." and have it be true.
I just think that we need to be bouncing the #frillypanties tag around more. It's been neglected. That is all. Take off heavy zig.
ZOMG. I know what I want for xmas! Adding fox urine granules to my amazon wish list.
Well, I'm glad you asked, Stephanie! You can buy fox urine at Amazon.com! http://bit.ly/oDuW
I didn't even know what Quicksilver was. I'll give it a look. Thanks!
Aww. Thanks for the compliment! CMD + N would be fine, but you already have to be in the finder to open a window with it.
Thanks for the compliment on my avatar. Oh, by the way #frillypanties!
Oh my god. What did friendfeed just do to you! You poor girl!
@superBR drove the van to work?! That fucker. Does he ever ride his bike anymore?
Wanna go check out Winco today? I really would like to go up there in the van. It's supposed to be dirt ass cheap for groceries.
Freeze! http://tinyurl.com/pyyw8
The squirrel is back in our house AND it accosted the guy fixing our stove!? This is an ill omen, friend.
I have my teaching shift at FREE GEEK this evening. May stop by the WordPress party after 7. Cubespace isn't too far from there.
I used to live down there. There's a place on Mission called Good Fricken Chicken that has AWESOME mediterranean food. Just sayin'.
We were playing World of Padman. It's free, open-source, and runs on OSX, WIN, and Linux. And fun, too! http://bit.ly/loFS
That's why the U.S. Americans need more maps.
I'm totally going out to the garage to grill right now! Here is the live stream to prove it!http://bit.ly/16DHE
I am totally gonna do it! I'm gonna go out there right now!
Ohhh. You mean organizing as in activism, not stuff. ; D
Maybe @Nycoherzog and I should add you to our streaming chore TV website as "Organizing".
And, later on, Floors Get Vacuumed.
Maybe we should start The Chore Channel.
O rly? Cause yarn is pretty cheap to come by at SCRAP. I volunteer there twice a week.
Thank you! I pride myself on my swift, yet thorough hand dishwashing style.
The snow on the way home kinda messed it up, but it's still crunchy!
Hot dogs > cheerios. #pdxmas
Great seeing you tonight at Chopsticks. Hope you had a good time. Happy birthday!
The Bene Gesserit Litany Against Egg Nog?
Last I talked, they weren't absolutely sure, but it's supposedly going to be in the same neighborhood.
@kristacolvin SCRAP is an awesome organization. We're getting a new, bigger location in Jan. Can't wait to see it.
I hear you're having a birthday at my work. i'll see you tonight!
Roommate ate every piece of kielbasa out of your big pot of soup? Is there enough left to drown him/her in the remaining soup?
And I were thinking about going to the mall, cause, ya know, why not? But then we were like, "Nah."
Yikes! ; D
In Your Water: Yokel Sprays Kids with Fox Urine http://tinyurl.com/6hnl2a #getoffmylawn
Anyone know if there's an OSX keystroke to open a finder window with one push?
Hoere jetzt Schlaflos in Muenchen folge 500 zu.
Just had a rousing few hours of deathmatch first-person shooter with the roommates over our LAN. I whipped some serious ass.
RT: @mariadeathstar Alicia Paulson (posie gets cozy) puts awesome handmade doll on eBay to raise $ for Free Geek: http://is.gd/bSVQ
Trying to organize an in-house LAN party, but roommates are too busy practicing right now to get their asses handed to them. Maybe later.
I know what I'm going to do! I'm going to grill up some chicken. Outside. No. Really. I am.
Now officially bored. This doesn't happen often. Usually I can amuse myself. Maybe I'll mess with StumbleUpon.
People actually were watching me do the dishes on ustream. What a depraved world we live in.
The dishes are done, man! http://tinyurl.com/6azjgq
Watch me do dishes! http://tinyurl.com/5a5rd3
Housemate just yelled at some kids for drawing on the household molester van. #getoffmylawn
I put lots of product in my hair to make it stand straight up tonight. Was doing a kind of medusa thing. It's crunchy!
sitting on my ass. Just ate a hot dog after work. thinking about playing xbox #pdxmas
Marveling at the beautiful city I live in as I walk home. I love you, Portland.
Walking home. More snow falling! Writing pdxpipeline Portland karaoke post in my head. #pdxtst #portlandkaraoke
I used to want to be a fiction writer when I was younger. But, ya know. ADD. Short format like blogging suits me.
Things heated up here pretty quickly. Another great party night at Chopsticks, #snowgasm be damned! #pdxtst
Another night of Chopsticks karaoke. Waiting for more peeps. Just sung waterloo.
Beep Beep Beep.
Got my interstitial playlist finished. Threw a little xmas in. Time to shower and get ready for work. Chopsticks II, here I come!
SCRAP, one of the places I volunteer, was in the New York Times yesterday. Nice. http://bit.ly/C9qz
